name: Full Stack Web Development with MERN
description: Learn to build modern, scalable web applications from scratch using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. This course covers everything from setting up your development environment to deploying a production-ready application.
tags: MERN, React, Node.js, Full Stack, Web Development
prerequisites: Basic understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

courseData.title: Module 1: Introduction to Node.js and Express
courseData.description: Getting started with backend development using Node.js and the Express framework.

questions.comment: What is the difference between `require` and `import`?

reviews.comment: This is the best MERN stack course I have ever taken! Highly recommended.

replies.comment: I agree! The instructor explains concepts very clearly.

description: Learn the fundamentals of cloud services like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud.

courseData.title: Module 1: What is the Cloud?
courseData.description: An overview of cloud computing models (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS).
